about_the_game:
Developed by Ice Fall Creative, Touhou meets Maze Play in this Hand-Drawn Comedy Arcade game featuring the strongest fairy in Gensokyo!

- Story -
Based on the Touhou Project series, Our bright entrepreneur Cirno and her best friend Daiyousei are set off to start their newest business venture selling snow cones to the residents of Gensokyo. Unfortunately, things don't work out as planned and you'll have to deal with the chaos that ensues!

- Gameplay -
Touhou Danmaku Maze is a "Maze Play" game with a different twist. Unlike most games where hazards attack you within the maze, this game thinks "outside the maze" in a unique Bullet Hell styled gameplay.

This game focuses heavily on danmaku gameplay with a speedrun routing mechanic. We hope players will explore all the variations of routing to get the best time possible!

- Features -
+ Each level contains 4 difficulites from Easy, Normal, Hard, and Lunatic

+ At launch, we plan to release 3 out of the 6 levels each containing a boss. Just like a Touhou game, we plan to create the same scope of gameplay similar in gameplay length.

+ Each level contains multiple songs based on the phase of the boss.

+ There are also Visual Novel styled cutscenes before and after each level.

short_description: Cirno is a business owner?!? Follow the story of Cirno & Daiyousei in their journey to get their first sale! Will Cirno be able to handle the dangers of business, or will the residents of Gensokyo make our idiot fairy bankrupt? Find out in this unique take on an arcade maze play danmaku game!
